Package com.tyndalehouse.step.core.service.impl

Class AppManagerImpl

java.lang.Object
com.tyndalehouse.step.core.service.impl.AppManagerImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
AppManagerService
@Singleton public class AppManagerImpl extends Object implements AppManagerService
Allows querying of app-specific properties, such as the installation properties
